Thermo Kings is a 1996 remix album by the British electronic music group 808 State.
Track listing
# "Joyrider" (A Natural Mix by 808state) – 7:00
# "Balboa" (A Paranormal Mix by 808state) – 6:14
# "Azura" (An Ultramarine Mix by 808state) – 5:50
